abstract: Rob Hughes On Soccer column profiles England's national soccer player Wayne Rooney, whose red card in European Championships qualifying match is only latest difficulty for his coach Fabio Capello.
snippet: Rooney’s red card in a qualifying match for the European Championships is only the latest difficulty for Fabio Capello, his coach on the English national team.
lead_paragraph: Rooney’s red card in a qualifying match for the European Championships is only the latest difficulty for Fabio Capello, his coach on the English national team.

headline.main: The Frustrations of Coaching Wayne Rooney
headline.print_headline: The Frustrations of Coaching Wayne Rooney
headline.seo: The Frustrations of Coaching Wayne Rooney
